extension_description: A voice extension for music playing capabilities.
no_player: Nothing is being played at the moment.
connect_description: This command can be used to make the bot connect to a voice channel without immediately start to play music.
connect_no_voice: {0}, you have to be in a voice channel to make the bot connect.
connect_no_move: {0}, the bot is already connected to a voice channel.
disconnect_no_voice: The bot has not joined any voice channel.
disconnect_description: This command can be used to make the bot disconnect from its current voice channel.
set_volume_description: Set the volume of the music player.
set_volume_set: Volume of the player set to {0}%
now_playing_description: Display more information on current music playing.
pause_resume_description: Pause or resume music playing temporarily.
stop_description: Clear the music queue and stop music playing.
skip_description: Vote to skip the current music: the track requester can skip without voting, while skipping normally requires {0} votes from others.
skip_vote_already_added: {0}, you have already voted to skip this song.
show_queue_description: Show the music player queue, using paging.
shuffle_queue_description: Shuffle the queue of the music player.
remove_from_queue_description: Remove a specific track from the music player queue.
remove_from_queue_index: of the track in the queue
loop_track_description: Activate or deactivate looping on current playing track.
play_description: This command is used to play or queue up music from various sources.
